==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|すい|どう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From [[水]] (''sui'', "water," "cold water") + [[道]] (''dō'', "passage," "duct")

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|すいどう|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|すいどう}}

# [[water]] [[service]], water [[supply]]
# [[channel]]

====Derived terms====
{{top2}}
* {{l|ja|水道屋}} (''suidōya''): plumber
* {{l|ja|水道管}} (''suidōkan''): water pipe
* {{l|ja|水道局}} (''suidōkyoku''): water bureau
* {{l|ja|水道工事}} (''suidō kōji''): waterworks
* {{l|ja|水道水}} (''suidōsui''): tap water
* {{l|ja|水道栓}} (''suidōsen''): hydrant, faucet
* {{l|ja|水道料}} (''suidōryō''): water rates
{{mid2}}
* {{l|ja|水道料金}} (''suidō ryōkin''): water charges
* {{l|ja|水道の水}} (''suidō no sui''): tap water
* {{l|ja|水道の栓}} (''suidō no sen''): water spigot
* {{l|ja|下水道}} (''gesuidō''): drain, sewer
* {{l|ja|上下水道}} (''jōgesuidō''): water and sewer services
* {{l|ja|上水道}} (''jōsuidō''): waterworks
* {{l|ja|中水道}} (''chūsuidō''): gray water system
